password_changed: Your password has been changed successfully
forgot_password_description: Please enter the mobile number or email address associated with your PayDay account.We'll send you a verification code to help you reset your password and regain access to your account.
track_notifications: Track your payday advance requests, compensation claims and updates with our smart notification feature.Never miss a notification!
perform_action_label: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
request_advance_description: Move the slider to select your advance amount.
phone_number_verification_label: We have sent a 4-digit verification code to
claimtypes_not_found: No Claims found for the moment
bank_account_update_success_message: Your bank account settings have been successfully updated
fingerprint_message: Would you like to enable Touch ID authentication for your account?
fingerprint_description: It provides a secure and convenient way to access the app. If you choose to enable this feature, you can do so in your device settings.
use_fingerprint_message: Securely access your account with just a touch of your finger using Touch ID/Fingerprint login.
set_password: Please choose a new password that has not been used before for this account.
activate_touch_id: Please enable Touch ID for your account.
no_biometric_account: No biometric account found. Please ensure that your device is set up with a valid biometric account and try again.
wrong_otp: Sorry, the One-Time Password (OTP) you entered is incorrect. Please try again or request a new OTP if you did not receive one.
passwords_do_not_match: The passwords you entered do not match. Please try again.
invalid_phone_number: The phone number you entered is invalid
i_have_read_tos: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions
check_the_box_plz: To proceed, please check the box indicating that you have read and agree to the terms and conditions
on_hold_by_insurance_desc: We are reviewing your information and will notify you as soon as your account has been approved. Thank you for your patience.
request_pending_approval: Your request is under review. We will notify you once your account is approved.
on_hold_by_organization_desc: Your request is under review. We will notify you once your account is approved by your organization.
type_advance_amount: Enter the amount of the advance
advance_amount_exceeded: The advance limit has been exceeded
account_created_successfully: Your account has been created successfully
not_adult: Please note that you must be at least 18 years of age or older to use this service
service_unavailable_in_your_country: Service not available in your country/region at this time
launching_soon: PayDay is not yet available in your country. The team is working on making it available very soon.
connection_timeout: Sorry, there was a problem connecting to our server. Check your internet connection and try again in a few minutes.
tutorial_description_1: PDT is designed to help you improve your financial stability. Choose a Takaful plan for a fixed monthly fee and benefit from interest-free tailored Salary-backed financial solution.
tutorial_description_2: PDT provides you with the protection you need against unforseean circumstances before the pay day. Subscribe into a Takaful bundle and benefit from an access to your Earned Salary thru your mobile.
tutorial_description_3: Choose a preferred package, request and manage your salary advances, make a claim, all in just few clicks.
authenticate_to_continue: Please authenticate yourself to proceed further
edit_personal_info_warning: Editing your personal information will put your account on hold until the changes are reviewed. This process may take up to 72 hours. Please ensure that the information you provide is accurate and up-to-date.
